recipe_name: Taleggio cheese on toast with a tomato and herb salsa
author: Lesley Waters
method: Preheat the oven to 180C/350F/Gas 4. For the cheese on toast, toast the bread in the oven for 3-4 minutes, or until lightly golden. Lay the slices of cheese on top of the toast then grill for 2-3 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbling. For the tomato and herb salsa, combine all of the salsa ingredients together in a bowl and mix well to combine. To serve, place the cheese on toast on a serving plate and spoon over the tomato and herb salsa.
ingredients: 2 slices white bread,  85g/3oz taleggio cheese, sliced,  2 vine tomatoes, de-seeded and chopped,  1 clove garlic, finely chopped,  2 tbsp chopped fresh parsley,  1 handful fresh basil leaves, torn,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
